articles.title: Scientists to perform Eddington experiment during April's total solar eclipse - Africanews English
articles.description: Portland Community College physics professor Toby Dittrich plans to perform a modern version of the Eddington experiment during the eclipse
articles.content:
Aprils total solar eclipse promises to be a scientific bonanza, thanks to new spacecraft and telescopes and cosmic chance.
The moon will be extra close to Earth, providing a long and intense period … [+1655 chars]

articles.author: Jason Rainbow
articles.title: SpaceX launches Eutelsat 36D, lands booster on seventh reuse anniversary - SpaceNews
articles.description: SpaceX launched Eutelsat’s latest geostationary satellite March 30 on a trip due to take around half a year to a geostationary orbit slot over Africa and Eurasia.
articles.content:
TAMPA, Fla. SpaceX launched Eutelsats latest geostationary satellite March 30 on a trip due to take around half a year to a geostationary orbit slot over Africa and Eurasia.
